parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets vehicle lock. Possible values:
<br> 
* "UNLOCKED" 
* "DEFAULT"
* "LOCKED"
* "LOCKEDPLAYER" </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName '''setVehicleLock''' lockState </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lockState: [[String]] see above </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_veh1 [[setVehicleLock]] "LOCKED";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lock]], [[locked]], [[lockDriver]], [[lockCargo]], [[lockTurret]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 22, 2014 - 02:01 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRevolution|AgentRevolution]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In Arma 3:<br>
setVehicleLock "UNLOCKED" = same as "[[lock]] 0"<br>
setVehicleLock "DEFAULT" = same as "[[lock]] 1"<br>
setVehicleLock "LOCKED" = same as "[[lock]] 2"<br>
setVehicleLock "LOCKEDPLAYER" = same as "[[lock]] 3"
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 4, 2015 - 15:57 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
DEFAULT lock is default vehicle lock when vehicle placed in editor. If player is in a group of AIs and not the leader, he will not be able to enter this vehicle as he will not have GetIn action for this vehicle.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
